page.title: 18School by John.
page.content:
I have not missed school except for two days. The school has 20 children and we have two Computers. We like to work on the computer and I like the Logic discs best. We have two teachers and we do Language and Maths. We play Rounders and I don't always win.
{Crime Rate.} Surprisingly there is a fairly high Crime Rate, but not the really serious type of crime prevalent in the larger cities. There has been vandalism and poaching in the Forest, also some theft. The articles stolen are Budgies,drills, an angle_grinder, a typewriter and diesel fuel.
